catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 834
creditline: Gift of funds from Gordon Brodfuehrer
description: abstract image in mostly yellow, black and periwinkle pigments; gradated black and gray pigments against a yellow background; circular shapes throughout in various sizes; blue circle in ULQ in right; red dot against a white oval in top right; red dot at bottom center
inscription: bottom center, in pencil: [inscription in Japanese characters] | bottom right, in pencil: Mandala no. I |  LRC, in pencil: 6/30 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: 150
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Mandala No. 1
